title: I got ganked level 2
body: Why does that automatically make me lose lane and fall behind?

replies.body: It doesnâ€™t necessarily. Depends on the match up in lane.
Because Batman is the coolest super hero guarding jump city.

It doesn't make you automatically lose unless you let tilt overcome you.

Ward. In the current meta where everyone bitches about lvl 2 ganks, either shove hard enough at lvl 2 that you can back off early, or play defensive so you're not open for a gank.

If you do get ganked and set behind, invest in defensive options (corrupting pot, coin in case you miss CS) so you can get back into the game.

I had a game on Trundle where I died twice to Camille in like five min and was behind about 30 CS by 10 min but I was still able to beat her through proper building and defensive play.
Because you don't hug turret or you overextend?
